row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.FILE_WRITE
row.description: Writes string content into Agent's temp directory.

row.process:
:SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_HPQC_STRCONTENT#) :SET &RETCODE# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,"&AGENT_CURR_DIR#&UC4RB_HPQC_FILENAME#", "&AGENT#", "&LOGIN#", OVERWRITE) :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
! validating if temp has created only then proceed otherwise abort the script :IF &RETCODE# <> 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: Aborting this job because temp file has not been created! RETCODE &RETCODE#" :ENDIF
